variable.name: FAMID
variable.comment: Arbitrary ID for family groups. Because of how families are determined, the same family ID does not necessarily represent a blood relationship

variable.name: SUBJID
variable.comment: De-identified eMERGE ID to represent each subject.

variable.name: MOTHER
variable.comment: Empty if mother is not known, or is not in this cohort.

variable.name: FATHER
variable.comment: Empty if father is not known, or is not in this cohort.

variable.name: TWINID
variable.description: Identifier for each group of twins
variable.comment: Empty if subject does not have a twin in this cohort.
